snippet: The effort to reduce costs at Sports Illustrated and the rest of the Time Inc. Sports Group through personnel cuts has ended with 13 buyouts and 3 layoffs.
abstract: Effort to reduce costs at Sports Illustrated and the rest of the Time Inc Sports Group through personnel cuts has ended with 13 buyouts and 3 layoffs.
lead_paragraph: The effort to reduce costs at Sports Illustrated and the rest of the Time Inc. Sports Group through personnel cuts has ended with 13 buyouts and 3 layoffs.

headline.seo: Sports Illustrated Makes Cuts to Staff
